description: QuickChanger is a wallpaper changing app for webOS.  **  Select and customize pictures taken with your devices camera or images already on the device.  **  Download images by entering the URL, or download hundreds of wallpapers by using the apps built in RSS driven wallpaper categories.  **  Customize each wallpaper image to your liking. You can zoom in and out and pan the image to achieve the exact look you are going for.  **  Toggle a wallpapers inclusion in the wallpaper rotation.  **  But what good is a beautiful wallpaper if the app you are running is ugly?  **  QuickChanger comes with four different hand picked backdrop images for skinning the app or use the current wallpaper instead.  **  Change the images opacity, or turn the backdrop images off completely.  **  QuickChanger wallpaper list defaults to showing each wallpapers thumbnail and description, but lets you change what is displayed.  **  You can make the thumbnail as big or small as you like, or turn it off entirely to browse your list wallpaper sans images. **  Need help? QuickChanger has in-scene help that describes the sections of the app and what they do. Good for the newbie amongst us who likes to know what each button is going to do before pressing it. This help easily hides away when it is not needed by conveniently collapsing to the top the the screen.  **  And for the minimalist in all of us, even the collapsed help marker can be turned off completely to provide a stark and uncluttered way to exist with you wallpaper collection.  **  Like change? So do we, that's why QuickChanger can be set to change your wallpaper randomly by interval. From a blistering wallpaper change every minute, to shuffling in something semi-new every 999 days... Change is good!  **  QuickChanger: What you lookin at?
